abstract: Prosecutors charge Bronx man Jose Feliciano with murder after he confessed to strangling his 2-month-old son, Mason Whyte; details of his admission given.
lead_paragraph: Jose Feliciano did not enter a plea at his arraignment, but prosecutors described how he told the police that he strangled the infant for crying.

headline.main: Bronx Man Charged With Killing His 2-Month-Old Son
headline.print_headline: Father of 2-Month-Old Admitted Strangling Him, Prosecutors Say

snippet: Jose Feliciano did not enter a plea at his arraignment, but prosecutors described how he told the police that he strangled the infant for crying.
